data.name: Janusz: The Handyman Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Janusz: The Handyman Simulator is a first-person game in which the player becomes the main character Janusz the handyman! The one of a kind of polish handyman.

Janusz will face various challenges helping members of the local community, helping them with their repair works. He also sometimes... Just wants to chill out.

Main features:

  • Loads of specific humor.
  • Physical interactions with the environment.
  • Each day offers unique challenges for the player.
  • Colorful characters ordering next tasks for Janusz.
  • Much more!

data.short_description: Janusz: The Handyman Simulator the only one realistic simulator of the polish handyman.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
